errorNoPermission: ❌ You do not have permission to perform this action.
registrationSuccess: ✅ Registration received! An admin will review it shortly.
dmInvitationBody: You have been invited by **{inviterTag}** to be the co-captain for **{teamName}** in the **{tournamentName}** tournament.
coCaptainAcceptedConfirmation: ✅ You have accepted the invitation! You are now a co-captain.
dmCaptainNotifiedOfAcceptance: ✅ **{userTag}** has accepted your invitation and is now your co-captain.
streamerWarningField1: 🔴 1. FILL IN ONLY YOUR STREAM USERNAME
streamerWarningField2: 🔴 2. BROADCAST ON THE CHANNEL YOU PROVIDE
streamerWarningBody:
To allow casters to work, it is **MANDATORY**:
- **Have IDs visible** in-game.
- **Disable in-game commentator audio**.
errorTournamentNotFound: ❌ Error: This tournament was not found.
errorAlreadyRegistered: ❌ You are already registered or on the waitlist for this tournament.
errorNotCaptain: ❌ You are not a Manager or Captain of any registered team on this Discord.
errorDraftNotFound: ❌ Error: This draft was not found.
errorAlreadyInDraft: ❌ You are already registered, pending approval, or pending payment in this draft.
errorMustVerify: ❌ You must verify your account first using the "Verify Account" button.
errorPickNotYourTurn: ❌ It's not your turn to pick or you don't have permission.
errorPickNoPlayers: ❌ There are no available players to select.
errorGeneric: ❌ There was an error processing your request.
errorNotCaptainTitle: ❌ You are not a Manager or Captain
errorNotCaptainDescription: To enroll in a tournament, you must first be a **manager or captain** of a team **registered on this Discord**.
errorNotCaptainManagerGuideTitle: 👉 If you are the Manager of your team:
errorNotCaptainManagerGuideValue:
1. Go to the #🏠・registra-equipo-o-unete channel.
2. Use the command or button for **Manager Actions**.
3. Follow the system steps.
4. Once registered, come back here and press the registration button again.
errorNotCaptainPlayerGuideTitle: 👉 If you are a Player or Captain (and not the manager):
errorNotCaptainPlayerGuideValue:
1. Ask your team's **manager** to register the club.
2. Once registered, the manager can **invite you** or you can **request to join**.
3. When you are on the roster, the manager can **promote you to captain**.
4. As a captain, you can then enroll the team in tournaments!
errorNotCaptainFooter: This system ensures all teams are correctly registered.
errorTeamOrTournamentNotFound: ❌ The tournament or team no longer exist.
registrationFinalizedAdminReview: ✅ Your registration for **{teamName}** has been received! An admin will review it shortly.
errorTeamNameExists: ❌ A team with this name already exists in this tournament.
registrationWaitlistSuccess: ✅ Registration received! You have been added to the **waitlist**.
registrationPaidPending: ✅ Registration received! Please check your Direct Messages to complete the payment.
errorDMBlocked: ❌ I could not send you a DM. Please open your DMs and try again.
registrationFreeAdminReview: ✅ Your registration has been received! An admin will review it shortly.
paymentNotified: ✅ Thank you! Your payment has been notified. You will receive an update upon approval.
errorPendingRegistrationNotFound: ❌ Your pending registration was not found. Please register again.
kickRequestSent: ✅ Your request to kick the player has been sent to the administrators for review.
prizePaidNotification: 💰 Good news! Your **{prizeType}** prize from the **{tournamentName}** tournament has been marked as **paid**. Thanks for participating!
captainUpdateNotification: ℹ️ An administrator has assigned **{userTag}** as the co-captain for your team **{teamName}**.
coCaptainUpdateNotification: ℹ️ An administrator has assigned you as the co-captain for the team **{teamName}** (Captain: {captainTag}) in the **{tournamentName}** tournament.
kickNotification: 🚨 You have been **kicked** from the **{tournamentName}** tournament by an administrator.
captainChangeNotificationFooter: If you have questions, contact an administrator.
draftPlayerSelectedTitle: You have been selected in the Draft!
draftPlayerSelectedBody: Congratulations! You have been chosen by the team **{teamName}** (Captain: {captainTag}) in the **{draftName}** draft.
